name: Single VM
description: VM, easy way to deploy a VM

metadata.longDescription: Deploys a single vm in VMware for development use

bullets.title: Default virtual machine settings
bullets.description:
• VMware:
    • Flavor:
      • Cores - 1
      • Memory - 1GB
      • Storage - Depends on Image
    • Network:
      • Private IP:
        • Availability - Customer Provided
        • Ingress - Via VPN
        • Egress - Not required
      • Public IP:
        • Availability - None
    • Firewall:
      • Ingress - Allows SSH, and TCP 8080 from all sources
      • Egress - All

bullets.title: Usage and special notes
bullets.description:
• 1. Downloads latest releases of software.
  • 2. To access the application and virtual machines, please see the instructions in the output log.
  • 3. More details of software can be found in https://tomcat.apache.org/.
